languages.text: "Шуму торжества не отвлечь меня от долга. Празднуйте, Вольный Торговец, а мы с Глейто позаботимся, чтобы никто вам не мешал".
"As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."
languages.original_text: "Шуму торжества не отвлечь меня от долга. Празднуйте, Вольный Торговец, а мы с Глейто позаботимся, чтобы никто вам не мешал".

"As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."
"As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."

"As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."
"As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."

languages.text: 「たとえこの機会がどれほど喜ばしいものであろうと、私は自らの職務をおろそかにすることはできません。ローグトレーダー、あなたは先に祝宴を楽しんでください。グライトと私は、誰にもこの日を台無しにさせないよう見張っています」
languages.original_text: "As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."

traits.locale_text: 「たとえこの機会がどれほど喜ばしいものであろうと、私は自らの職務をおろそかにすることはできません。ローグトレーダー、あなたは先に祝宴を楽しんでください。グライトと私は、誰にもこの日を台無しにさせないよう見張っています」

languages.text: "So freudig dieses Ereignis auch sein mag, es darf mich nicht von meiner Pflicht abhalten. Aber geht Ihr ruhig und feiert, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Glaito und ich werden dafür sorgen, dass niemand Euren Tag ruiniert."
languages.original_text: "As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."

traits.locale_text: "So freudig dieses Ereignis auch sein mag, es darf mich nicht von meiner Pflicht abhalten. Aber geht Ihr ruhig und feiert, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Glaito und ich werden dafür sorgen, dass niemand Euren Tag ruiniert."

languages.text: « Aussi réjouissante que soit cette occasion, je ne peux pas délaisser mon devoir. Mais allez profiter des festivités, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Glaito et moi nous assurerons que rien ne vienne troubler votre journée. »
languages.original_text: "As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."

traits.locale_text: « Aussi réjouissante que soit cette occasion, je ne peux pas délaisser mon devoir. Mais allez profiter des festivités, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Glaito et moi nous assurerons que rien ne vienne troubler votre journée. »

languages.text: «Por jubilosa que sea esta ocasión, no debo desatender mis obligaciones. Vaya usted al festejo, Comerciante Independiente. Glaito y yo nos aseguraremos de que nadie le arruine el día».
languages.original_text: "As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."

traits.locale_text: «Por jubilosa que sea esta ocasión, no debo desatender mis obligaciones. Vaya usted al festejo, Comerciante Independiente. Glaito y yo nos aseguraremos de que nadie le arruine el día».

languages.text: “尽管这是场令人欣悦的庆典，但我会保持警惕，一丝不苟地履行我的职责。好好庆祝吧，行商浪人，我和格雷托会保证没人敢捣乱。”
languages.original_text: "As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."

traits.locale_text: “尽管这是场令人欣悦的庆典，但我会保持警惕，一丝不苟地履行我的职责。好好庆祝吧，行商浪人，我和格雷托会保证没人敢捣乱。”

languages.text: "Bu vesile her ne kadar şenlikli olsa da beni görevimden alıkoyamaz. Siz kutlamanıza bakın Hür Tacir. Glaito'yla ben, kimsenin keyfinizi kaçırmasına müsaade etmeyeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "As jubilant as this occasion may be, it cannot distract me from my duty. You go ahead and celebrate, Rogue Trader. Glaito and I will make sure no one ruins your day."

traits.locale_text: "Bu vesile her ne kadar şenlikli olsa da beni görevimden alıkoyamaz. Siz kutlamanıza bakın Hür Tacir. Glaito'yla ben, kimsenin keyfinizi kaçırmasına müsamaha göstermeyeceğiz."
